name: Espresso
description: A strong and rich coffee made by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.
instructions: Use 18g of coffee and extract 36g in 25-30 seconds.

name: Ristretto
description: A short shot of espresso made with the same amount of coffee but less water.
instructions: Use 18g of coffee and extract 20g in 15-20 seconds.

name: Lungo
description: A long espresso shot made with the same amount of coffee but more water, resulting in a milder and more diluted flavor.
instructions: Use 18g of coffee and extract 50-60g in 35-40 seconds.

name: Americano
description: Espresso diluted with hot water for a lighter taste.
instructions: 1 shot of espresso + 100ml hot water.

name: Cappuccino
description: A classic Italian coffee drink with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and foam.
instructions: 1 shot of espresso + 60ml steamed milk + milk foam.

name: Latte
description: Smooth and milky with a shot of espresso and steamed milk.
instructions: 1 shot of espresso + 200ml steamed milk.

name: Mocha
description: A sweet combination of espresso, chocolate, and milk.
instructions: 1 shot espresso + 20g chocolate syrup + 150ml steamed milk.

name: Flat White
description: A strong coffee with velvety microfoam milk.
instructions: 1 shot espresso + 150ml steamed milk with microfoam.

name: Macchiato
description: Espresso topped with a small amount of steamed milk or foam.
instructions: 1 shot espresso + a dollop of steamed milk.

name: Affogato
description: A dessert-style coffee with a scoop of vanilla ice cream topped with hot espresso.
instructions: 1 shot espresso poured over a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Cold Brew
description: Coffee brewed with cold water over an extended period for a smooth, less acidic flavor.
instructions: Steep coarsely ground coffee in cold water for 12-24 hours.

name: Irish Coffee
description: A cocktail of hot coffee, Irish whiskey, and sugar, topped with cream.
instructions: 1 shot espresso + 30ml Irish whiskey + sugar to taste + whipped cream on top.

name: Cortado
description: Equal parts espresso and steamed milk, for a balanced, smooth drink.
instructions: 1 shot espresso + 1 shot steamed milk.

name: Red Eye
description: A strong coffee drink made by adding a shot of espresso to a cup of drip coffee.
instructions: 1 cup drip coffee + 1 shot espresso.

name: Doppio
description: A double shot of espresso for extra strength and flavor.
instructions: 2 shots espresso.

name: Vienna Coffee
description: Espresso topped with whipped cream instead of milk or sugar.
instructions: 2 shots espresso + whipped cream.

name: Mazagran
description: A cold, sweetened coffee drink with lemon, originally from Algeria.
instructions: 1 shot espresso + ice + lemon + sugar (optional).

name: Bicerin
description: A layered drink from Turin with espresso, hot chocolate, and milk or cream.
instructions: Layer 1 shot espresso, 1 shot hot chocolate, and 1 shot milk/cream in a glass.

name: Turkish Coffee
description: Traditional unfiltered coffee with a thick foam, brewed in a cezve.
instructions: Finely ground coffee, water, and sugar (optional) are simmered in a cezve until foamy, then poured unfiltered into a cup.

name: Café au Lait
description: French-style coffee with equal parts brewed coffee and steamed milk.
instructions: Brewed coffee + equal part steamed milk.

name: Kopi Tubruk
description: Indonesian-style strong, sweet coffee made by boiling coarse grounds with sugar.
instructions: Coarse coffee grounds and sugar are boiled together, then poured unfiltered into a glass.

name: Café Bombón
description: Spanish coffee drink made with espresso and sweetened condensed milk.
instructions: 1 shot espresso + 1 shot sweetened condensed milk, layered in a glass.

name: Yuanyang
description: A popular Hong Kong drink blending coffee and Hong Kong-style milk tea.
instructions: Mix 1 part coffee with 1 part Hong Kong-style milk tea.

name: Egg Coffee
description: Vietnamese coffee with a creamy, sweet egg yolk foam on top.
instructions: Brew strong coffee, whip egg yolk with sweetened condensed milk, and pour the foam over the coffee.

name: Espresso Romano
description: Espresso served with a slice of lemon to enhance its brightness.
instructions: 1 shot espresso, served with a lemon slice on the side.
